vals.name: Слайдер
vals.html: [[cont]]
vals.meta_js: const slider = el.querySelector('.w-elements-grid'); const animation =params.sel_2.replace(/\_/gi, '-'); slider.classList.add('owl-carousel'); $(slider).owlCarousel({ loop:params.loop_owl, slideTransition: `${animation}`, navContainerClass: 'owl-navigate', slideBy: params.sliderby_x_all, navText: [ "", "" ], center: params.center_owl, mouseDrag: params.mouse_drag_owl, touchDrag: params.touch_drag_owl, pullDrag: params.pull_drag_owl, nav: true, autoplayHoverPause: true, responsive:{ 0:{ slideBy: (params.sliderby_x_xs == undefined) ? params.sliderby_x_all : params.sliderby_x_xs, items:(params.count_slider_x_xs == undefined) ? params.count_slider_x_all : params.count_slider_x_xs, autoplay: params.autoplay_owl_xs, autoplayTimeout: (params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_xs == undefined) ? params.autoplay_delay_owl_all : params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_xs, smartSpeed: (params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_xs == undefined) ? params.autoplay_speed_owl_all : params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_xs, paginationSpeed: (params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_xs == undefined) ? params.autoplay_speed_owl_all : params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_xs, margin: (params.margin_owl_x_xs == undefined) ? params.margin_owl_all : params.margin_owl_x_xs, }, 600:{ slideBy: (params.sliderby_x_sm == undefined) ? params.sliderby_x_all : params.sliderby_x_sm, items:(params.count_slider_x_sm == undefined) ? params.count_slider_x_all : params.count_slider_x_sm, autoplayTimeout: (params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_sm == undefined) ? params.autoplay_delay_owl_all : params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_sm, autoplay: params.autoplay_owl_sm, smartSpeed: (params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_sm == undefined) ? params.autoplay_speed_owl_all : params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_sm, paginationSpeed: (params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_sm == undefined) ? params.autoplay_speed_owl_all : params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_sm, margin: (params.margin_owl_x_sm == undefined) ? params.margin_owl_all : params.margin_owl_x_sm, }, 1000:{ slideBy: (params.sliderby_x_md == undefined) ? params.sliderby_x_all : params.sliderby_x_md, items:(params.count_slider_x_md == undefined) ? params.count_slider_x_all : params.count_slider_x_md, autoplayTimeout: (params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_md == undefined) ? params.autoplay_delay_owl_all : params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_md, autoplay: params.autoplay_owl_md, smartSpeed: (params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_md == undefined) ? params.autoplay_speed_owl_all : params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_md, paginationSpeed : (params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_md == undefined) ? params.autoplay_speed_owl_all : params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_md, margin : (params.margin_owl_x_md == undefined) ? params.margin_owl_all : params.margin_owl_x_md, }, 1280:{ items: params.count_slider_x_all, autoplay: params.autoplay_owl, autoplayTimeout: +params.autoplay_delay_owl_x_all, smartSpeed: +params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_all, paginationSpeed: +params.autoplay_speed_owl_x_all, margin:params.margin_owl_x_all, } } })

values.ease: Анимация начинается медленно, затем ускоряется и к концу движения опять замедляется
values.ease_in: Анимация медленно начинается, к концу ускоряется
values.ease_out: Анимация начинается быстро, к концу замедляется
values.linear: Одинаковая скорость от начала и до конца

variables.message: При настройки положения следует учитывать количество точек, узнать количество точек можно в предпросмотре или на опубликованной.
